item.title: XERIANT INC 10-K
item.description: XERIANT INC, which is in the Aircraft [3721] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 13, 2022 had 22979 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 413 instances may - 261 instances stock - 223 instances financial - 200 instances common - 188 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
